data.sentence: The word وَأَنْتُمْ comes from the root ا ن ت م and is associated with the meanings: you (plural)

data.meanings: to be prosperous/blessed/happy/auspicious/fortunate/lucky, be in a state of felicity, thrive, aid/assist/help, accommodated/adapted/disposed him to the right course, one who is blessed.
data.sentence: The word سَامِدُونَ comes from the root س م د and is associated with the meanings: to be prosperous/blessed/happy/auspicious/fortunate/lucky, be in a state of felicity, thrive, aid/assist/help, accommodated/adapted/disposed him to the right course, one who is blessed.
